name: Dr. Fantastic's Tarot Readings
desc: A fortune teller application that gives users a short Tarot card reading, using a Tarot API for all card data.

name: GameKiwi
desc: A minimalist social media platform that allows users to share their 'top ten' video game list with friends and those interested. Uses the RAWg API for all game data.
build: Handlebars, Node JS, mySQL, Sequelize, External API(s)

name: Ecstatic Exertion
desc: A fitness tracker that allows users to save a record of workouts and then track progress over time in performance graphs.

name: Silmaril Gram
desc: A application built using React, which allows managers to view and sort from an employee records API.

name: le Phare Weather Dashboard
desc: A weather dashboard for all those voyageurs de phare.
